stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains a major reason for the emergence of the Second Great Awakening in the United States?
choicesHtml: The expansion of participatory democracy fostered popular engagement in religion as well.
The arrival of large numbers of immigrants from Europe brought new religious ideas to the United States.
The rise of individualistic and evangelical spiritual beliefs inspired religious conversion.
The proclamation of the Monroe Doctrine in the Western Hemisphere created a sense of spiritual independence.
